attributes.action: stop halifax making obsecene charges for an AGREED overdraft!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Use the goverments money you to help your customers not destroy them financially! This petition is for people who have recieved a letter about the £1 a day charge for AGREED overdrafts. It is obsecene and we customer will not stand for it!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
